title: Textile, "Chockablock", 2002
medium:
Medium: mohair, cotton
Technique: jacquard woven
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 274.3 x 137.2 cm (8 ft. 12 in. x 54 in.)
description: Light blue ground with celery green mohair pile. Alternating the pile direction gives a checkerboard of light and dark green, while narrow stripes of the blue left visible between alternate blocks add a third color element and create syncopation in the overall scheme.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Chockablock", 2002.
2002. Medium: mohair, cotton
Technique: jacquard woven. Gift of Mark Pollack. 2007-23-7.
